actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 94-158.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate (companion bill H.R. 7136 passed).

official_title: A bill to continue the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children through September 30, 1975.

summary.text: Continues the special supplemental food program (created under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966) for women, infants, and children through September 30, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to continue the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children through September 30, 1975.
